name: 1.39.5 Libraries

children.name: ND_open_pbr_anisotropy
children.doc: Computes anisotropic surface roughness as defined in the OpenPBR specification.

children.name: ND_directional_light
children.doc: A light shader node of 'directional' type.

children.name: ND_point_light
children.doc: A light shader node of 'point' type.

children.name: ND_spot_light
children.doc: A light shader node of 'spot' type.

children.name: ND_absorption_vdf
children.doc: Constructs a VDF for pure light absorption.

children.name: ND_add_bsdf
children.doc: A node for additive blending of BSDF's.

children.name: ND_add_edf
children.doc: A node for additive blending of EDF's.

children.name: ND_add_vdf
children.doc: A node for additive blending of VDF's.

children.name: ND_anisotropic_vdf
children.doc: Constructs a VDF scattering light for a participating medium, based on the Henyey-Greenstein phase function.

children.name: ND_artistic_ior
children.doc: Converts the artistic parameterization reflectivity and edge_color to  complex IOR values.

children.name: ND_blackbody
children.doc: Returns the radiant emittance of a blackbody radiator with the given temperature.

children.name: ND_burley_diffuse_bsdf
children.doc: A BSDF node for Burley diffuse reflections.

children.name: ND_chiang_hair_absorption_from_color
children.doc: Calculates hair absorption from a color.

children.name: ND_chiang_hair_bsdf
children.doc: A BSDF node for Chiang hair shading model.

children.name: IM_chiang_hair_bsdf_genmdl
children.doc: materialx::pbrlib_{{MDL_VERSION_SUFFIX}}::mx_chiang_hair_bsdf(mxp_tint_R:{{tint_R}}, mxp_tint_TT:{{tint_TT}}, mxp_tint_TRT:{{tint_TRT}}, mxp_ior:{{ior}}, mxp_roughness_R:{{roughness_R}}, mxp_roughness_TT:{{roughness_TT}}, mxp_roughness_TRT:{{roughness_TRT}}, mxp_cuticle_angle:{{cuticle_angle}}, mxp_absorption_coefficient:{{absorption_coefficient}}, mxp_curve_direction:{{curve_direction}})

children.name: ND_chiang_hair_roughness
children.doc: Calculates hair roughness for R, TT and TRT component.

children.name: ND_conductor_bsdf
children.doc: A reflection BSDF node based on a microfacet model and a Fresnel curve for conductors/metals.

children.name: IM_conductor_bsdf_genmdl
children.doc: materialx::pbrlib_{{MDL_VERSION_SUFFIX}}::mx_conductor_bsdf(mxp_weight:{{weight}}, mxp_ior:{{ior}}, mxp_extinction:{{extinction}}, mxp_roughness:{{roughness}}, mxp_thinfilm_thickness:{{thinfilm_thickness}}, mxp_thinfilm_ior:{{thinfilm_ior}}, mxp_normal:{{normal}}, mxp_tangent:{{tangent}}, mxp_distribution:{{distribution}})

children.name: ND_conical_edf
children.doc: Constructs an EDF emitting light inside a cone around the normal direction.

children.name: ND_deon_hair_absorption_from_melanin
children.doc: Calculates hair absorption from melanin parameters.

children.name: ND_dielectric_bsdf
children.doc: A reflection/transmission BSDF node based on a microfacet model and a Fresnel curve for dielectrics.

children.name: IM_dielectric_bsdf_genmdl
children.doc: materialx::pbrlib_{{MDL_VERSION_SUFFIX}}::mx_dielectric_bsdf(mxp_weight:{{weight}}, mxp_tint:{{tint}}, mxp_ior:{{ior}}, mxp_roughness:{{roughness}}, mxp_thinfilm_thickness:{{thinfilm_thickness}}, mxp_thinfilm_ior:{{thinfilm_ior}}, mxp_normal:{{normal}}, mxp_tangent:{{tangent}}, mxp_distribution:{{distribution}}, mxp_scatter_mode:{{scatter_mode}}, mxp_base:{{base}}, mxp_top_weight:{{top_weight}})

children.name: ND_displacement_float
children.doc: A constructor node for the displacementshader type.

children.name: ND_displacement_vector3
children.doc: A constructor node for the displacementshader type.

children.name: ND_generalized_schlick_bsdf
children.doc: A reflection/transmission BSDF node based on a microfacet model and a generalized Schlick Fresnel curve.

children.name: IM_generalized_schlick_bsdf_genmdl
children.doc: materialx::pbrlib_{{MDL_VERSION_SUFFIX}}::mx_generalized_schlick_bsdf(mxp_weight:{{weight}}, mxp_color0:{{color0}}, mxp_color82:{{color82}}, mxp_color90:{{color90}}, mxp_exponent:{{exponent}},mxp_roughness:{{roughness}}, mxp_thinfilm_thickness:{{thinfilm_thickness}}, mxp_thinfilm_ior:{{thinfilm_ior}}, mxp_normal:{{normal}}, mxp_tangent:{{tangent}}, mxp_distribution:{{distribution}}, mxp_scatter_mode:{{scatter_mode}}, mxp_base:{{base}}, mxp_top_weight:{{top_weight}})

children.name: ND_generalized_schlick_edf
children.doc: Modifies an EDF with a directional factor.

children.name: ND_glossiness_anisotropy
children.doc: Calculates anisotropic surface roughness from a scalar glossiness/anisotropy parameterization.

children.name: ND_layer_bsdf
children.doc: Layer two BSDF's with vertical layering.

children.name: ND_layer_vdf
children.doc: Layer a BSDF over a VDF describing the interior media.

children.name: ND_light
children.doc: A constructor node for the lightshader type.

children.name: ND_measured_edf
children.doc: Constructs an EDF emitting light according to a measured IES light profile.

children.name: ND_mix_bsdf
children.doc: Mix two BSDF's according to an input mix amount.

children.name: ND_mix_edf
children.doc: Mix two EDF's according to an input mix amount.

children.name: ND_mix_vdf
children.doc: Mix two VDF's according to an input mix amount.

children.name: ND_multiply_bsdfC
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of a BSDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_multiply_bsdfF
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of a BSDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_multiply_edfC
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of an EDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_multiply_edfF
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of an EDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_multiply_vdfC
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of an VDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_multiply_vdfF
children.doc: A node for adjusting the contribution of an VDF with a weight.

children.name: ND_oren_nayar_diffuse_bsdf
children.doc: A BSDF node for diffuse reflections.

children.name: ND_roughness_anisotropy
children.doc: Calculates anisotropic surface roughness from a scalar roughness/anisotropy parameterization.

children.name: ND_roughness_dual
children.doc: Calculates anisotropic surface roughness from a dual surface roughness parameterization.

children.name: ND_sheen_bsdf
children.doc: A microfacet BSDF for the back-scattering properties of cloth-like materials.

children.name: ND_subsurface_bsdf
children.doc: A subsurface scattering BSDF for true subsurface scattering.

children.name: ND_surface
children.doc: A constructor node for the surfaceshader type.

children.name: ND_translucent_bsdf
children.doc: A BSDF node for pure diffuse transmission.

children.name: ND_uniform_edf
children.doc: An EDF node for uniform emission.

children.name: ND_volume
children.doc: A constructor node for the volumeshader type.

children.name: ND_surface_unlit
children.doc: Construct a surface shader from emission and transmission values.

targets: essl, genglsl, genmdl, genmsl, genosl, genoslnetwork, genslang
